comments.body:
Just so it's clear and we agree to what we're doing:

this is the API that @eed3si9n had intentionally removed from public API in #30, now brought back.
I was not aware of this, I'll have a look. It's not clear to me why this was removed.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +22,26 @@     * @return A Scala compiler with the given configuration.
     */
    ScalaCompiler scalaCompiler(ScalaInstance scalaInstance,
                                File compilerBridgeJar,
                                ClasspathOptions classpathOptions);
